title: A Treasury of Science Fiction
description: One of the earliest hardbound anthologies of science fiction, this collection includes 30 stories by recognised leaders in the field, including Poul Anderson, Arthur C Clarke, Robert Heinlein, Jack Williamson, A E van Vogt, Clifford D Simak, Murray Leinster and others. Edited by Groff Conklin, the master of early SF anthologies.
author: Groff Conklin
